product_name: Mountaineers Books Mountaineering: The Freedom of the Hills - 8th Edition - Hardcover
long_description: Celebrating 50 years since its publication, this anniversary edition of Mountaineering: The Freedom of the Hills, presented here in hardcover, has endured as the classic mountaineering text.
